price: 79. Ma doonnida, waxaa lahaa dad masaa- kiin ah oo badda ka xoogsada. Waxaana doonay inaan ceeb u yeelo, waayo waxaa hortooda ahaa boqor ku qaata doonni walba (oo hagaagsan) qasab.
arabic: أَمَّا ٱلسَّفِينَةُ فَكَانَتۡ لِمَسَٰكِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ فَأَرَدتُّ أَنۡ أَعِيبَهَا وَكَانَ وَرَآءَهُم مَّلِكٞ يَأۡخُذُ كُلَّ سَفِينَةٍ غَصۡبٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ammā al-safīnatu fakānat limasākīna yaʿmalūna fī al-baḥri fa-aradttu an aʿībahā wakāna warāahum malikun yakhudhu kulla safīnatin ghaṣban
